bestBHT.bht: Peter, who was in prison, continued knocking at the door while everyone inside was in awe. They all heard the persistent knocking and rushed out to see what was happening. When they opened the door, they were astonished to see Peter standing there. They could hardly believe their own eyes. It was amazing to them that he had been rescued from prison, especially considering the strong guard that was in place. Peter's determination and the miraculous nature of his release left them in awe and wonder.

Albert Barnes: They were convinced that it was Peter.
They were amazed that he had been rescued.
Archibald T. Robertson: Continued knocking. Now all heard the knocking.
When they had opened. The whole group rushed out to the courtyard this time to make sure.
They were amazed. The frequent second aorist active (intransitive) indicative of εξιστημ.
John Gill: But Peter continued knocking.... That they might come to him, and let him in; beginning to be impatient, and being very desirous of seeing his friends..."
when they had opened the door, and saw him, they were astonished: they could hardly believe their own eyes...
it was amazing to them, how it should be, that he should be delivered out of prison, when they knew there was such a strong guard about him.

bhtAttempts.bht: Peter, who was in prison, continued knocking at the door while everyone inside was in awe. They all heard the persistent knocking and rushed out to see what was happening. When they opened the door, they were astonished to see Peter standing there. They could hardly believe their own eyes. It was amazing to them that he had been rescued from prison, especially considering the strong guard that was in place. Peter's determination and the miraculous nature of his release left them in awe and wonder.

Peter's continued knocking at the door while in prison left everyone amazed and eager to see what was happening. When they finally opened the door, their astonishment grew as they saw Peter standing before them. It was truly incredible to witness his release, especially given the strong guard that surrounded him. The resiliency of Peter and the miraculous nature of his rescue left them in awe and wonder.

Peter's persistent knocking at the door while he was in prison was a testament to his determination and urgency to see his friends. The astonishment of those inside grew as they heard the knocking and rushed to open the door, barely believing their own eyes when they saw Peter standing before them. The miraculous nature of Peter's rescue left them amazed, considering the secure guard that surrounded him. It was truly a remarkable event that filled them with wonder and gratitude.

Peter's insistent knocking at the door of the prison displayed his impatience and eagerness to be reunited with his friends. The astonishment of those inside grew as they all heard the knocking and rushed to open the door, unable to believe their own eyes when they saw Peter standing before them. The miraculous deliverance of Peter, despite the presence of a strong guard, left them in awe. The whole event was nothing short of amazing, leaving them filled with wonder and amazement.

Peter's fervent knocking at the prison door reflected his urgency and desire to see his friends. The astonishment among those inside escalated as they collectively heard the persistent knocking and hurriedly opened the door. Their eyes beheld Peter, and they were astounded, finding it difficult to comprehend his sudden presence. The extraordinary deliverance of Peter, despite the heavily guarded circumstances, left them in awe. The entire incident was truly astonishing, fostering a sense of wonder and amazement among those witnesses.
